summary: Makes Lydia invisible, So she looks more like the weapon she is carrying.
descriptionHtml:
Makes Lydia invisible, So she looks more like the weapon and or armor she is carrying.
Farengar has rewarded the dragonborn by secretly creating lydia, A construct that can take any weapon form given to it.
you might have to get into a battle first for some weapons to appear "like my floating books mod the staff item" ;)

Recommended mods
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/72859/?tab=2&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmodfiles%2F%3Fid%3D72859&pUp=1][font=Trebuchet MS, Helvetica, sans-serif][color=#ffffff][b]thelawfulls floating books by me! :)[/b][/color][/font][/url]
It is obviously not needed but cant say a floating book is not awsome!
author: thelawfull
